DOC.brief_summary: The objective study describe examine dietary intake , eat behavior physical activity level cohort Hong Kong Chinese T2DM association weight glycemic control baseline 1 year follow-up . DOC.brief_title: Dietary Intake , Eating Behavior , Physical Activity Level Their Relationships With Glycemic Weight Control Hong Kong Chinese Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female Chinese ethnicity 2 . Diagnosis T2DM 3 . Able read Chinese give informed write consent 1 . Type 1 diabetes mellitus 2 . Endstage renal failure require dialysis chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) stage 4 3 . Malignancy diagnose within 3 year 4 . Pregnancy lactation 5 .
